评论详情: I love this new tank top. The fabric is super soft, fits well with room to wiggle and versatile. All for under 20.00! I plan on buying another white and black and navy. Labeled as summer, but weight is great for layering for fall and winter!

Wonderful for work. They look surprisingly good and the cut enhances my shape. They fit perfectly and wash easily and so simple. No need to iron or care for them much, I washed them regularly and they always look great. I use as is and under my blazers too. Highly recommended!

Size down if it want it fitted; the material is stretchy so it will still work.  It’s a thin material, comfortable, high quality, I love it layered with a nice cardigan or wool coat. It’s exactly what I wanted

This is such a unique top! I love the texture and the material almost has a hint of shimmer so it feels both dressy/elegant and casually comfortable at the same time. The length is great to pair with jeans or a skirt and even though the material seems thinner it doesn’t show a bra or bra lines. It’s stretchy so could probably fit a wide variety of sizes. I’m smaller with a flat chest (30A-32AA) so it is just slightly big in the underarm area for me but not so much that it’ll show my bra or really gape. I’m used to size small being pretty big on me and usually have to return them but this one fits well enough that the unique style makes me not only keep it but purchase other colors. On me it isn’t super form fitting and I do like that because I feel like it makes it a bit more modest with a skirt and with jeans it dresses them up and looks classy but also flirty. I have not washed it yet but I think it’ll do ok especially with being hung to dry. All in all for the price I really recommend this top, it’s different and fun and I think it would look great on a wide variety of body types!

This tank top is perfect under blouses. It is so soft and such a gentle stretch. The texture also looks great, compared to a regular boring tank top. I also appreciate that I can get it in XL  without having enormous neck and arm holes
Love this shirt!  Beautiful color and feel. Gives just enough texture without looking bulky. Size was perfect. Works great for layering under cardigans.
I bought ever color. These are perfect for work
Runs small, didn’t like the clingy material , returning

They remind me of the popcorn shirt BUT fit like a glove. The cut of the shirt is pretty flattering on me and it's very lightweight. I got them on sale and I have to say they're worth it for a quick office look. Not the softest material but still overall a good deal.
Very comfortable. Style by design Fits snug/form fitting. I sized up med to large for personal comfort around mid section and still maintain the elegant look.  It is see through. I wore a bralette

I bought this in a couple of colors and have to say that the blue is BEAUTIFUL! It does not have show-through. I usually buy M tops, but ordered in L because I wanted it to not be skin-tight. Perfect fit! I have larger arms, and an hourglass figure and wow, this looks great! The cream-almost white color doesn't show my bra through in most lighting, but I CAN see it a bit. Not so with the blue or black colors.  I would say "for the price" but I'm just going to say regardless of price, this is a highly nice top! It's not thick, but it's not so thin that you can see through it in the darker color, either. It sits flatteringly on my figure.
Love the fit and material.

Color is rich, material is so comfortable and the fit is exactly what I hoped for. Perfect to wear by itself or under a blazer/cardigan. Very pleased!

I really like these tops. They're beautiful with a silky look to them. They're comfortable, well-made and cute. They're easy to wash and have a nice stretch to them. My only gripe is how short they are. They barely reach my butt and I don't really have a long torso but it's still wearable. It's a good value for the price since you get two and I do recommend it.

I was looking for a nice sleeveless top in cream color.  This top has a nice fit.  It hugs just enough to be flattering without being too tight.  I'm very happy with it and may purchase other color(s).
Runs small, but it stretches a little without losing color or thickness.

Yellow is a hard color to capture, but this was exactly matched to the photo.  The fit is great, the length is perfect for tucking in or leaving out.  Super light weight, but still warm due to the synthetic fabric, making it perfect for fall layering.
I love these. I would give them 5 stars but the white is pretty thin. However, when I wear them I always get compliments. Good quality, good fit.

This tank top is very nice.  Love that the armholes are cut too much, so not worrying about which bra to wear with it.  This will be great for fall/winter season  under a blazer.  Works well now with our unusual warm weather too.

The material is lightweight and breathable, though it's not soft on the skin.  I purchased a small and it fit well. The blue is a lighter and brighter shade of blue than what is pictured,  but I think it is a nice blue. I'm happy with my purchase. I bought it for work and I think the shimmer on the material looks professional. This top is stretchy, not see through,  and washes in a washing machine.

This top really IS quite lovely and seems to be made well. It is lined, too! BUT…it runs small! I ordered this (printed) top and a solid colored (beige) in large and both were too big, especially with the arm holes. I could have made the printed top work, but returned both for a size smaller. Very see through material. Not the material I thought it would be. Seems itchy.

They are not a favorite go to type of top. I might try wearing them when it cooler outside with a sweater or jacket. They hold up okay when I wash them, I have not put them in the dryer.
Great fit - just as advertised - and attractive.

These tops are true to size and color and are as pictured in the product description. I ordered medium (I wear size 6 in tops and 34 B bra; 5'1"), and they fit well. The pattern and style are flattering if you don't have a full flat stomach (mom of four here--four C-sections). The material is comfortable and is of exceptional quality; there is is no shrinking or fading in wash cycle. Overall, these are quality tops that can be worn in all seasons. I plan on wearing a cardigan or jacket over them in the fall or winter for a professional look. This is a great value for a quality product.

~ These sleeveless blouses are less comfortable than other polyester/spandex blend tops I have. Maybe it’s the faux knit, but something itches on the outside even after having been washed. ~ Fitted look is ok. But the shoulders (or what there is of them) are small in coverage. If I wanted to wear this as a single layer, I’d be constantly checking to see if my bra strap was showing on top or under my arm. And with the textured look, I’m limited on what I can wear as the outer layer. ~ Loving the versatility of beige-colored tops, I find this one too sheer. The color/design of my bra definitely shows thru. ~ Watch the Size Chart. Don’t go just on your regular size. Select the closest size based on actual measurements for the features that are key to you (You’ll be amazed).

评论详情: These look nice, and the sizing is as expected, however the fabric is not what I expected. I was expecting it to be softer and an actual ribbed knit, not just a texture that mimics a ribbed knit quality. It feels a little rough to me, but then my skin is somewhat sensitive to rough textures, moreso than most people I think, so this may not be an issue for others. It's just very synthetic feeling, and i was hoping for something a little bit softer. It does seem like it would be very breathable for summer weather, though.

Love this top so much! Perfect for summertime at work. Will definitely get more colors! Really good quality.

“Zeagoo Women's High Neck Tank Top 2024 Summer Casual Ribbed Knit Slim Fitted Basic Textured Sleeveless Shirts”  My wife ordered these sleeveless textured shirts as casual wear for the summer months.  These shirts fit true to size and are nice and stretchy - especially in the neck to get over her hair and makeup.  However, she found the material to be not as soft on the skin, and somewhat itchy and sticky to wear in more humid weather.  Overall, she’s pleased, but we removed one star due to the feel on the skin.

These tank top sets are a great value and come in a huge variety of colors. I ordered the red and blue set and the colors are rich and vivid. These definitely hug the body, so if you want a looser fit, size up. They are lightweight and soft, and surprisingly breatheable in the warm weather. They wash well and the textured ripples are attractive and fashion forward. I am very happy with these shirts and plan to order another set in a different color combination. These are versatile and look nice with everything from shorts to a long summer skirt.

I recently bought a set of these tank tops in black and beige, and I've been really impressed with them! The fabric is so soft and stretchy, it feels really comfortable against my skin. They hug my curves nicely without being too tight, and the high neckline adds a touch of sophistication that makes them perfect for both casual wear and dressing up a bit.  I love that I can throw them on with a pair of jeans for a relaxed look, or dress them up with a skirt and heels for a night out. The black and beige are both really versatile colors that go with pretty much anything, so I know I'll get a lot of wear out of them. Overall, I'm really happy with these tank tops and would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish summer staple. The texture makes the shirt look more elegant.  I'm usually a large and got these in a large, they're true to size.

评论概述: Soft, Comfortable Tank: A Versatile Wardrobe Staple
评论详情: These tank tops are exactly what I've been looking for! The fabric is unbelievably soft and comfortable, it feels great against my skin. They've become a go-to piece in my wardrobe because they are so versatile. I can wear one alone on warm days, or layer it under a jacket or sweater for cooler weather. It even looks polished enough to wear under a blazer for work.  The fit is flattering; it skims my curves without being too tight. The material moves with me throughout the day, which is important because I'm always on the go. Plus, the color is amazing! It's a vibrant and eye-catching, and it really adds a pop to any outfit.  Overall, I'm absolutely thrilled with this tank top. It's soft, comfortable, flattering, and versatile. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great layering piece or a stylish top to wear on its own.

评论概述: Runs just a tad small, but looks amazing on.
评论详情: I got these for my wife, since she wears this style a lot during summer. The fabric is decent and also fairly soft. They are a bit smaller than the size suggests (Medium) and that translates to a tighter fit, showing her shape more. I'm OK with that! I think they look amazing on her and the colors are a great selection.

I ordered these to have for summer to wear alone or under a jacket.  The silhouette and design is flattering and nice.  That said, I ordered my size according to the size chart and I found them to run on the smaller side even with the stretch.  And they did not stretch as much as I thought.  Although the nice thing is that there is no gap at the underarm which sometimes happens with sleeveless items.  I ordered the black and cream, two good basic colors.  They are constructed well and they are a decent value for the price.

These tops are incredibly comfortable and don't roll up a ton. The texture kind of goes away when stretched so you can't exactly see the texture when wearing it but it still looks nice. The high neck line sits just right isn't suffocating and doesn't need to be adjusted throughout wear. Can be dressed up or dressed down. Overall this feels like a very quality top and appears to be made well, the material is soft, slightly stretchy and textured. It is slightly thicker than a generic cotton shirt so it does not show lines for bras or belly button or rolls so that is really nice. I would definitely recommend these high neck tank tops.
Very nice quality and vibrant colors. Would recommend.

Zeagoo Women's 2 Pack High Neck Slim Fitted Basic Tank Top Knit are nice ..the material is stretchy, comfortable and breathable.. they're well made ..the design is simple yet classic.. will work with a variety of outfits.. will recommend them
